verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> departed <S%G5563><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> Athens <S%G116><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Corinth <S%G2882><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> Jew <S%G2453><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%>, born <S%G1085><s%> in Pontus <S%G4193><s%>, lately <S%G4373><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Italy <S%G2482><s%>, with <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%>; (because that <S%G1223><s%> Claudius <S%G2804><s%> had commanded <S%G1299><s%> <S%G5760><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> to depart <S%G5563><s%> <S%G5745><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>:) and came <S%G4334><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> he was <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> of the same craft <S%G3673><s%>, he abode <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5707><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wrought <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5711><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> by their occupation <S%G5078><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> tentmakers <S%G4635><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he reasoned <S%G1256><s%> <S%G5711><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> <S%G2596><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> persuaded <S%G3982><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Greeks <S%G1672><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> <S%G5037><s%> Sila <S%G4609><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> were come <S%G2718><s%> <S%G5627><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> was pressed <S%G4912><s%> <S%G5712><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and testified <S%G1263><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> was Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they opposed <S%G498><s%> <S%G5734><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, he shook <S%G1621><s%> <S%G5671><s%> his raiment <S%G2440><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Your <S%G5216><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> be upon <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> own heads <S%G2776><s%>; I <S%G1473><s%> am clean <S%G2513><s%>: from <S%G575><s%> henceforth <S%G3568><s%> I will go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5695><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the goyim <S%G1484><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he departed <S%G3327><s%> <S%G5631><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>, and entered <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man's house <S%G3614><s%>, named <S%G3686><s%> Justus <S%G2459><s%>, one that worshipped <S%G4576><s%> <S%G5740><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> joined hard <S%G4927><s%> <S%G5723><s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> to the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Crispus <S%G2921><s%>, the chief ruler of the synagogue <S%G752><s%>, believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> on the YY <S%G2962><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Corinthians <S%G2881><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> <S%G5723><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5712><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> he continued <S%G2523><s%> <S%G5656><s%> there a year <S%G1763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when Gallio <S%G1058><s%> was the deputy <S%G445><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of Achaia <S%G882><s%>, the Jews <S%G2453><s%> made insurrection <S%G2721><s%> <S%G5627><s%> with one accord against <S%G3661><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> fellow persuadeth <S%G374><s%> <S%G5719><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to worship <S%G4576><s%> <S%G5738><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to the Torah <S%G3551><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> was now about <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5721><s%> his mouth <S%G4750><s%>, Gallio <S%G1058><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> it were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> matter of wrong <S%G92><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> lewdness <S%G4467><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> ye Jews <S%G2453><s%>, reason <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3056><s%> would <S%G302><s%> that I should bear <S%G430><s%> <S%G5633><s%> with you <S%G5216><s%>:
And <S%G2532><s%> he drave <S%G556><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> <S%G5637><s%> Sosthenes <S%G4988><s%>, the chief ruler of the synagogue <S%G752><s%>, and beat <S%G5180><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him before <S%G1715><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> Gallio <S%G1058><s%> cared <S%G3199><s%> <S%G5707><s%> for none <S%G3762><s%> of those things <S%G5130><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> after this tarried <S%G4357><s%> <S%G5660><s%> there yet <S%G2089><s%> a good <S%G2425><s%> while <S%G2250><s%>, and then took his leave <S%G657><s%> <S%G5671><s%> of the brethren <S%G80><s%>, and sailed thence <S%G1602><s%> <S%G5707><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%>; having sshofar <S%G2751><s%> <S%G5671><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Cenchrea <S%G2747><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> a vow <S%G2171><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he came <S%G2658><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, and <S%G2548><s%> left <S%G2641><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them there <S%G847><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>, and reasoned with <S%G1256><s%> <S%G5675><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> desired <S%G2065><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him to tarry <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5658><s%> longer <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4119><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, he consented <S%G1962><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>;

But <S%G235><s%> bade <S%G657><s%> them <S%G846><s%> farewell <S%G657><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, I <S%G3165><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> by all means <S%G3843><s%> keep <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%> this feast <S%G1859><s%> that cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> I will return <S%G344><s%> <S%G5692><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, if 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5723><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he sailed <S%G321><s%> <S%G5681><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had landed <S%G2718><s%> <S%G5631><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>, and gone up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saluted <S%G782><s%> <S%G5666><s%> the Congregation <S%G1577><s%>, he went down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after he had spent <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5660><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> there, he departed <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and went over <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5740><s%> all the country <S%G5561><s%> of Galatia <S%G1054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Phrygia <S%G5435><s%> in order <S%G2517><s%>, strengthening <S%G1991><s%> <S%G5723><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> Jew <S%G2453><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%>, born <S%G1085><s%> at Alexandria <S%G221><s%>, an eloquent <S%G3052><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, and mighty <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> <S%G1415><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the scriptures <S%G1124><s%>, came <S%G2658><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>.

This man <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> instructed in <S%G2727><s%> <S%G5772><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> being fervent <S%G2204><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, he spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5707><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5707><s%> diligently <S%G199><s%> the things of <S%G4012><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>, knowing <S%G1987><s%> <S%G5740><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> the immersion <S%G908><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to speak boldly <S%G3955><s%> <S%G5738><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>: whom <S%G846><s%> when <S%G1161><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, they took <S%G4355><s%> <S%G5639><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them, and <S%G2532><s%> expounded <S%G1620><s%> <S%G5639><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> more perfectly <S%G197><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was disposed <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to pass <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5629><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Achaia <S%G882><s%>, the brethren <S%G80><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, exhorting <S%G4389><s%> <S%G5671><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> to receive <S%G588><s%> <S%G5664><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: who <S%G3739><s%>, when he was come <S%G3854><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, helped them <S%G4820><s%> <S%G5639><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> which had believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5761><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> he mightily <S%G2159><s%> convinced <S%G1246><s%> <S%G5711><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and that publickly <S%G1219><s%>, shewing <S%G1925><s%> <S%G5723><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> that Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.
